title: Grey Warwick (What happens if you already own and end up gaining the required honor for him?)

embed.description: As it stands, the original owners of both these skins have recieved nothing in compensation with the recent re-release of these skins. Both these skins were incredibly rare (at least Championship Riven level). At the very least we should get some sort of legacy border... Thoughts?

body:
Should i stop moaning?

Is if fair? Did riot think of this before re- releasing?

Hmm, might need to stop and realize this is only going to become more re ac curing as other skins get re-opened and regurgitated as 
rewards for different events will unfold. I cant wait for them to release King Rammus again...... not.

Does anyone know of any alternative reward? Dare i ask riot?

Ok, So iv found this from link https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148:

I already have Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick skins! What do I get instead?

If you already have those skins, you’ll still get a chance to pick up some new champions through champion shards in Honor Capsules, with more rewards coming through them over time. Also, Honor-exclusive loading screen flairs let others know when you’ve received honors from teammates and you’ll unlock even more rewards at the end of the season.

Does this sound fair?
